Name: Ruby
Review Text: Pleasant sphere combined with amazing food gives a memorable evening dining. Nevertheless, I found a few number of dishes a bit salty. Other than that, this is a very nice restaurant.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Delicious lunch with great variety & good prices.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Great food, fantastic service! We had the tapas style special and it was a great way to try a lot of their dishes. Everything we had was delicious. The staff were welcoming and friendly. I'm so glad we decided to try this place. Will definitely return!

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Very nice food with a friendly stuff. I am quite addicted and going very often, highly recommended!

Name: Ruby
Review Text: We found this Chinese restaurant in the shopping mall near Novotel Hotel.  It was late at night and it is the few restaurant still open.  The food is so good that we didn't take any photo as we are very hungry.  It is very popular as people lining outside for a table.  The staff is also very nice.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: I like this restaurant and visit it every time I am in Zuid.The service and quality of food is on high level in all these years.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Excellent atmosphere and really good foods.  Calm and zen-like.  Friendly and courteous staff.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Nice surprise at gelderlanplein! Nice food with vegetarian and some vegan options. Nice family restaurant with good service.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Very friendly staff and the food is outstanding. Go hungry and get the 3 tapas dishes deal. You won't be disappointed.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Ruby has been a great place to eat Asian food for a long time now. The refurbished ambience and the new “tapas-style” menu have made it even better. They pay great attention to the food and the service, and the family that runs the place is always warm and welcoming. Highly recommended!

Name: Ruby
Review Text: I enjoyed the lunch here! The staff are very friendly and the service is good!

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Not a lot of food options in this area and was staying in the next door hotel and was given a recommendation to go here. Did the 30 euro 3 part tapas (with side) twice to get 6 options, which was nice to try many different things however …

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Good restaurant serving tasty food. The ambiance was nice too. Prices were decent except for the Chinese tea which I'm used to being for free or £1 a person and not the same price as a beer. …

Name: Ruby
Review Text:
Second time in this restaurant. Typical Dutch style Asian food for non-asian people.
The assistant is not well traine, but they still charge supplementary service …

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Great staff who took the time to recommend food and were very accommodating and attentive. Food was delicious. I have eaten here few times and have not been disappointed.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Good authentic cuisine, pleasant decor and environ, good service, polite staff, very good value

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Great Chinese food as far as Amsterdam goes. Which isn’t saying much. The price is high, and the quality “pretty good”, with good portion sizes in general. A nice restaurant if you want Chinese food.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: I always visit this restaurant at least twice whenever I am in Amsterdam for a conference or a visit (travelling all the way from Down Under New Zealand!) , and I like to invite guests here, especially when they are visitors to the country. …

Name: Ruby
Review Text: If you like a good Chinese then go here. Lovely decor too as not tacky but modern and contemporary. Tasty fresh food and perfect portions. Recommend the 3 course tapas deal.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Chinese restaurant with the shared dining concept. Which is a bit strange, chinese people do share their food usually (order several dishes and share). However, in this restaurant the portions are tapas size, making them very expensive. 10+ …

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Exquisite Asian cuisine in a sophisticated and quiet setting. The 'tapas' formula is a clever menu solution. We were a party of five and were happily sharing a multitude of well presented dishes.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: My friend ordered pork fried rice and I ordered pork WITH fried rice and veg. We paid the same price but my friend got a much smaller dish. When I complained the manager answered: “If you want, I can charge you more”. We felt she was quite rude and unapologetic

Name: Ruby
Review Text: We did a take away so we didn't really sat in the restaurant. The food was good. Price was average. The manager was very nice when we took the order.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: I always come here when staying in the Element hotel, because they have a satisfyingly good quality of food. Large range of dishes from all over Asia. Very friendly and adequate service and good atmosphere.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Excellent food with very nice wait staff. Recommendations were excellent. Would eat here every day.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Used to go here with my family before. Even after ten years, the host is still very kind and the prices are accurate to the quality of food.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Friendly staff serving Asian cuisine with a south east Asian twist! Beef curry and hokkien noodles are my favourite, and the wantan soup noodles are perfect for chilly Dutch weather!

Name: Ruby
Review Text: The Babi Pangang is some of the best I tasted in Amsterdam

Name: Ruby
Review Text:
On first sight not too expensive, but very(!) small dishes.
Taste is ok/good.
Excellent service.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Great food, pleasantly authentic and very tasty. Helpful and friendly staff. Menus available in English too!

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Just not the run out the mill Asian restaurant. The food was great and delicately flavoured. I would definitely recommend the crispy porc belly

Name: Ruby
Review Text: There is something special with this restaurant. Visited twice. Every dish we tried were exceptionally yummy.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Great choice of food, friendly staff. Worth a visit. Will go again and again... :-)

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Good clean food, friendly staff. They serviced as the kitchen had closed but reopened it for a two person take away

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Great food with vegetarian options. Fresh orange juice was yummy and prices were decent too

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Very friendly and accommodating staff. Dumplings, noodles and chicken tasted great.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Good Chinese/Surinamese food. Also has a different lunch menu available, good prices.

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Staff was super nice and the food was delicious! I can really recommend this restaurant! :)

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Food smells and tastes like cleaning products. Will never eat there again! :(

Name: Ruby
Review Text: The best asian tapas in the city! Super accurate and tasty food surrounded by a relaxing and comfortable ambient!

Name: Ruby

Name: Ruby
Review Text: Very good foods and service! I like noodle soups and steamed dumpling.

Name: Ruby

Name: Ruby

Name: Ruby
